dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, kicking off today, we're diving into Forbes' list of America's Best Large Employers. And, um, there's some really interesting stuff happening there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, kicking off today, we're diving into Forbes' list of America's Best Large Employers. And, um, there's some really interesting stuff happening there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These actions, among other initiatives, helped UAB secure the top spot on Forbes list of Americas Best Large Employers 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for sure. One that really stood out to me was the University of Alabama at Birmingham – UAB. Like, they topped the list!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for sure. One that really stood out to me was the University of Alabama at Birmingham - U A B. Like, they topped the list!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These actions, among other initiatives, helped UAB secure the top spot on Forbes list of Americas Best Large Employers 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And what they went through, particularly during the pandemic, is pretty wild. Dr. Ray Watts mentioned they had almost 300 COVID patients at once.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And what they went through, particularly during the pandemic, is pretty wild. Doctor Ray Watts mentioned they had almost three hundred degrees c O V I D patients at once.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Weve had almost up to 300 Covid patients at a time with 30% in an ICU, says President Dr. Ray Watts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And 30% of those were in the ICU. But he praised their employees' resilience, saying they did it "without complaint." That's just, wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And thirty percent of those were in the I C U. But he praised their employees' resilience, saying they did it without complaint. That's just, wow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Weve had almost up to 300 Covid patients at a time with 30% in an ICU, says President Dr. Ray Watts. They have done it without complaint.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, remarkable. And they really stepped up for their staff too. Ample PPE, right? Like, they had to open a huge warehouse just for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, remarkable. And they really stepped up for their staff too. Ample P P E, right? Like, they had to open a huge warehouse just for it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To ensure their health this past year, Watts says all employees have been supplied with ample personal protective gear. After an outpouring of donations from the community and the university, the hospital had to open a 20,000 square foot warehouse...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally. A 20,000 square foot warehouse holding over 100,000 masks, 150,000 gowns, and 5.5 million gloves. Plus mental health apps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally. A twenty thousand square foot warehouse holding over one hundred thousand masks, one hundred fifty thousand gowns, and five point five million gloves. Plus mental health apps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the hospital had to open a 20,000 square foot warehouse, where it now stores more than 100,000 masks, 150,000 reusable isolation gowns and 5.5 million exam gloves. All employees were also given access to mental health resources, including a mental wellness app developed at the university.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty comprehensive. But it wasn't just about COVID, was it? UAB also focuses on community investment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty comprehensive. But it wasn't just about C O V I D, was it? U A B also focuses on community investment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Watts credits UABs strong standing to its focus on community.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. They give an $8,000 grant to employees who buy or renovate a home nearby. And subsidized childcare during the pandemic!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. They give an eight thousand dollar grant to employees who buy or renovate a home nearby. And subsidized childcare during the pandemic!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a means of investing in its employees and the vitality of its campus neighboring towns, every employee who buys or renovates a home in the surrounding area is given an $8,000 grant, he says. The university has also provided many employees with subsidized childcare during the pandemic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's incredibly supportive. And innovation too, I saw they developed a contact-tracing app, GuideSafe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's incredibly supportive. And innovation too, I saw they developed a contact-tracing app, GuideSafe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last summer, UAB faculty developed a contact-tracing app called GuideSafe, which notifies users if they have been within six feet of another user who has tested positive for Covid-19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, GuideSafe. It’s been used by hundreds of thousands, not just in Alabama. They really try to protect their people, their "greatest asset."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, GuideSafe. It's been used by hundreds of thousands, not just in Alabama. They really try to protect their people, their greatest asset.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hundreds of thousands of people not only in Alabama but around the country have used this, he says. We tried to be as innovative as we can and make sure we are protecting our greatest asset, which is our people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What a great mindset. Shifting gears a bit, another company that ranked highly, um, surprised me with their benefits. Netflix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What a great mindset. Shifting gears a bit, another company that ranked highly, um, surprised me with their benefits. Netflix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ranking at No. 21 is another company thats helped customers and employees weather the past year: Netflix.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Netflix! Yeah, they're not just about streaming. They've got mindfulness apps, education reimbursement for kids...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Netflix! Yeah, they're not just about streaming. They've got mindfulness apps, education reimbursement for kids...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the streaming service has offered customers a cure to their pandemic boredom, its offered employees access to mindfulness app Headspace and text-based coaching platform Ginger. Netflix also recently introduced an education reimbursement of up to $6,000 for employees children during the pandemic...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] And the backup care, right? Child, elder, even pet care for up to ten days. That's, like, unheard of.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the backup care, right? Child, elder, even pet care for up to ten days. That's, like, unheard of.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...this in addition to covering the cost of child, elder, adult or even pet backup care for up to 10 days through Care.com in the U.S.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously! And unlimited paid parental leave, plus seventy-five thousand dollars for fertility or adoption support.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously! And unlimited paid parental leave, plus seventy-five thousand dollars for fertility or adoption support.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Though Netflix co-CEO Reed Hastings was famously quoted last fall as saying he isnt a fan of remote work, his companys benefits packagewhich includes unlimited paid parental leave (though new parents typically take between four and eight months) and $75,000 to support fertility, surrogacy or adoptionaffords employees ample work-life balance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And transgender-inclusive benefits, like gender confirmation surgery. That’s, uh, really comprehensive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And transgender-inclusive benefits, like gender confirmation surgery. That's, uh, really comprehensive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amir Moini, a spokesperson for Netflix, says the company also offers paid military leave, for both active duty and training, as well as transgender-inclusive benefits, including gender confirmation surgery, mastectomy with chest reconstruction, scrotoplasty, phalloplasty and voice therapy, among others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It is. They have an "inclusion lens" in all aspects, apparently. It really shows what companies can do when they prioritize their people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is. They have an inclusion lens in all aspects, apparently. It really shows what companies can do when they prioritize their people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We try to operate from this inclusion lens in all aspects of our business, Moini says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It makes sense why they ranked so high. I mean, the methodology involved 50,000 anonymous employee surveys, rating how likely they'd recommend their employer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It makes sense why they ranked so high. I mean, the methodology involved fifty thousand anonymous employee surveys, rating how likely they'd recommend their employer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To determine the list, Statista surveyed 50,000 Americans working for businesses with at least 1,000 employees. All the surveys were anonymous, allowing participants to openly share their opinions. The respondents were asked to rate, on a scale of zero to 10, how likely theyd be to recommend their employer to others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which really speaks volumes, doesn't it? When your own employees are your biggest cheerleaders, you know you're doing something right.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which really speaks volumes, doesn't it? When your own employees are your biggest cheerleaders, you know you're doing something right.
